resources.string: Experienced Full-stack Java/Kotlin developer with over 4 years of hands-on experience on enterprise software development by implementing complete software development life cycle phases.

Languages: Java 8, Kotlin
Web Services: RESTful API, Microservices
Design Patterns: Dependency Injection, Dagger1, Dagger2, Adapter, Observer,Factory, MVP, MVC, MVVM
SDLC: Agile/Scrum, Test-Driven Development

Experienced Full-stack Java/Kotlin developer with over 4 years of hands-on experience on modern Java-based technologies, mainly using Spring and Hibernate with databases like oracle, plsql, MySQL, and MongoDB. I used ReactJS for front-end development. I have worked on business domains like construction, internet-of-things, hospitality, health, e-commerce and agriculture. I am a very good team player and quick learner.
Bachelors of Science in Computer Science
Master of Science in Computer Science
